UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Minimal antimicrobial peptidic sequence from hemoglobin alpha-chain: KYR.
Literature.Author: Catiau L, Traisnel J, Delval-Dubois V, Chihib NE, Guillochon D, Nedjar-Arroume N

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli(MIC=4µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=1µM),Listeria innocua(MIC=1µM),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=4µM)
